resources.string:
This app is a simple demo that gets current weather and daily forecast for your city. 
 It is a simple use case of calling external web server and use Third-Party API (from openweathermap.org service) . 

 It uses AIDL, synchronous/asynchronous calls to an external web server, also JSON parsing into POJO object and some other features. 

 e.g Type Madrid, London and press "Look up sync" make a synchronous call to service, async to make an asynchronows call
